detectors.description:
owned.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#15-17) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#16)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#16)

NOSToken._transfer(address,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#77-95) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(suspendTrading == false) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#78)

NOSToken.burnFrom(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#200-207) has costly operations inside a loop:
	- totalSupply -= _value (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/fd/fdb2af1d5072782477292e242f0ffd988964cd69_NOSToken.sol#204)
